(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Declaration 
      (GeneratorFunctionDeclaration 
        (StatementBlock 
          (Statement 
            (ExpressionStatement 
              (Expression 
                (YieldExpression)))) 
          (Statement 
            (ExpressionStatement 
              (Expression 
                (YieldExpression 
                  (Expression 
                    (Identifier "arg2"))))))) 
        (Identifier "generateStuff") 
        (FormalParameters 
          (RequiredParameter 
            (Identifier "arg1")) 
          (RequiredParameter 
            (Identifier "arg2")))))) 
  (Statement 
    (EmptyStatement ";")))
